ChangeList.Description: Added the **status** property to the [approvalStep](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/approvalStep?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **assignedToMe** property to the [approvalStep](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/approvalStep?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added the [filterByCurrentUser](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/userConsentRequest-filterByCurrentUser?view=graph-rest-beta) method to the [userConsentRequest](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/userConsentRequest?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added the [filterByCurrentUser](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/appConsentRequest-filterByCurrentUser?view=graph-rest-beta) method to the [appConsentRequest](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/appConsentRequest?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
